author: iris850
title: Excellent location for a stay in London Review
text:
I stayed for 2 nights in the Phoenix Hotel in February and had a most enjoyable experience. I arrived early but my room was ready which I really appreciated. I stayed in a double room for sole use as I prefer to have a bath rather than a shower in the bathroom and the management accommodated me in this respect. The room was quiet, the housekeeping excellent and the breakfast was very good and filling. Previously I had stayed in the sister hotel Kensington Gardens which also was an excellent hotel.
The location of the hotel is excellent being near restaurants and most importantly tube stations - Bayswater being just a few minutes walk away. I would highly recommend this hotel and will return next time I am in London.
